AI Description: VarScan is a platform-independent variant caller for massively parallel sequencing data, focused on variant discovery in next-generation sequencing data. It detects germline variants, somatic mutations, and copy number alterations (CNVs) based on multi-sample or paired tumor-normal data.
Core Features: Detects Germline Variants, Somatic Mutations, & Cnvs, Supports Multi-Sample Or Paired Tumor-Normal Data, Enables The Use Of Both DNA-Seq & RNA-Seq Data, Provides Statistical & Heuristical Methods For Variant Calling, Generates Detailed Variant Calls Including Genotype, Read Depth, Frequency, & Quality
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Ngs, Variant Calling, Somatic Mutations, Copy Number Alterations
